document.full_text: the scheduled execution in mississippi on tuesday of a man who killed a family of four in 1990 has been stayed by the u.s. court of appeals for the fifth circuit, according to a court document.
document.title: court stays mississippi execution set for tuesday
lines_and_colors: the scheduled execution in mississippi on tuesday of a man who killed a family of four in 1990 has been stayed by the u.s. court of appeals for the fifth circuit, according to a court document.
